resources.string: To use the application, first it\'s necessary to accept the terms described below.
Welcome to a new event!\n\nTell us what is the event\'s code below so you can start capturing moments!
You have to be connected to the internet
Ops, there is a problem with the connection
Something went wrong. Try returning and redoing the operation.
Only during this period, all the photos you take will be sent to the event\'s owner.
You can pause or stop the photo capturing at any time you want.
So, let\'s get into it? Ready to capture amazing moments?
Ops, something went wrong. Try again later.
We couldn\'t update the event status…
Are you sure you want to leave? Photo capturing will be terminated.
Would you like to use our application too? We are always available through the email below:
Thank you for using our application and service!

For now we are under pre-beta version of our app and service. That means that for a while we are passing the app through a series of tests. We hope you experience with us was more than pleasant! If you want to be part of it or to hear the latest news, send us a message to the aforementioned email!
We put ourselves at your disposal in case of doubts or comments. Feel free to get in contact with us any time you want.
For the application to work, you have to grant permission. You can always revoke it later.
Upload images only when connected to WiFi
You are ready to go! Now the easy and fun part, just take amazing photos!
